channel.title: Suid on Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Suid on Personal Blog

item.title: [HTB] Machine: Magic
item.description:
Magic

Enumeration

  • nmap
└─$ nmap -Pn -p- 10.10.10.185 --min-rate 5000
Starting Nmap 7.94 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2023-10-28 17:53 BST

item.title: [HTB] Machine: Laboratory
item.description:
Laboratory

Starting Nmap 7.93 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2023-07-06 18:25 BST

Not shown: 997 filtered tcp ports (no-response)

| ssh-hostkey:
| 3072 25ba648f799d5d95972c1bb25e9b550d (RSA)
|_ 256 7720ffe946c068921a0b2129d153aa87 (ED25519)

|_http-server-header: Apache/2.4.41 (Ubuntu)

| tls-alpn:
|_ http/1.1
| ssl-cert: Subject: commonName=laboratory.htb
| Subject Alternative Name: DNS:git.laboratory.htb
| Not valid before: 2020-07-05T10:39:28
|_Not valid after: 2024-03-03T10:39:28
|_http-title: The Laboratory
|_http-server-header: Apache/2.4.41 (Ubuntu)
|_ssl-date: TLS randomness does not represent time

  • dig
┌──(kali㉿kali)-[~]
└─$ dig AXFR bank.htb @10.10.10.29
; <<>> DiG 9.18.12-1-Debian <<>> AXFR bank.htb @10.10.10.29
;; global options: +cmd
bank.htb. 604800 IN SOA bank.htb. chris.bank.htb. 5 604800 86400 2419200 604800
bank.htb. 604800 IN NS ns.bank.htb.
bank.htb. 604800 IN A 10.10.10.29
ns.bank.htb. 604800 IN A 10.10.10.29
www.bank.htb. 604800 IN CNAME bank.htb.
bank.htb. 604800 IN SOA bank.htb. chris.bank.htb. 5 604800 86400 2419200 604800
;; Query time: 231 msec
;; SERVER: 10.10.10.29#53(10.10.10.29) (TCP)
;; WHEN: Tue Jun 06 16:43:22 BST 2023
;; XFR size: 6 records (messages 1, bytes 171)
